$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic/Chinese.title: $:/Tekan/Actions/Basic/Chinese
$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic/Chinese.caption: 基础模板
$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic/Chinese.text:
<$wikify name="newboardTitle" text={{{ [[$:/kanbanboard/]addsuffix<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">] }}}>
<$vars
	stateTitle="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption"
	newboardCaption={{$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption}}
	newboardTags="$:/tags/Tekanboard"
	newboardText={{$:/config/NewKanbanBoard/Text}}
	listPlanningTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Planning]] }}}
	listOngoingTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Ongoing]] }}}
	listCompletedTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Completed]] }}}
>

<$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/BoardName"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$list filter="[<newboardTitle>!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newboardTitle>> caption=<<newboardCaption>> tags=<<newboardTags>> text=<<newboardText>>/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listPlanningTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="计划中"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listPlanningTitle>]"/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listOngoingTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="进行中"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listOngoingTitle>]"/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listCompletedTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="已完成"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listCompletedTitle>]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" $value=<<newboardTitle>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption" text=""/>
</$list>
</$reveal>

</$vars>
</$wikify>

$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic.title: $:/Tekan/Actions/Basic
$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic.caption: Basic
$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic.text:
<$wikify name="newboardTitle" text={{{ [[$:/kanbanboard/]addsuffix<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">] }}}>
<$vars
	stateTitle="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption"
	newboardCaption={{$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption}}
	newboardTags="$:/tags/Tekanboard"
	newboardText={{$:/config/NewKanbanBoard/Text}}
	listPlanningTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Planning]] }}}
	listOngoingTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Ongoing]] }}}
	listCompletedTitle={{{ [<newboardTitle>addsuffix[/Completed]] }}}
>

<$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/BoardName"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$list filter="[<newboardTitle>!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newboardTitle>> caption=<<newboardCaption>> tags=<<newboardTags>> text=<<newboardText>>/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listPlanningTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="Planning"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listPlanningTitle>]"/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listOngoingTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="Ongoing"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listOngoingTitle>]"/>
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<listCompletedTitle>> tags=<<newboardTitle>> caption="Completed"/>
	<$action-listops $tiddler=<<newboardTitle>> $subfilter="+[append<listCompletedTitle>]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" $value=<<newboardTitle>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption" text=""/>
</$list>
</$reveal>

</$vars>
</$wikify>

$:/Tekan/Actions/Default.title: $:/Tekan/Actions/Default
$:/Tekan/Actions/Default.caption: Default
$:/Tekan/Actions/Default.text:
<$wikify name="newboardTitle" text={{{ [[$:/kanbanboard/]addsuffix<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">] }}}>
<$vars
	stateTitle="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption"
	newboardCaption={{$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption}}
	newboardTags="$:/tags/Tekanboard"
	newboardText={{$:/config/TekanNewBoard/Text}}
>

<$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/BoardName"/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTitle>> text="">
<$list filter="[<newboardTitle>!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newboardTitle>> caption=<<newboardCaption>> tags=<<newboardTags>> text=<<newboardText>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" $value=<<newboardTitle>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption" text=""/>
</$list>
</$reveal>

</$vars>
</$wikify>

$:/Tekan/AddCard.title: $:/Tekan/AddCard
$:/Tekan/AddCard.text:
\define newHereButtonTags()
[[$(currentList)$]]
\end

\define addNote()
<$wikify name="newnoteTitle" text={{{ [[$:/kanban/]addsuffix<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">] }}}>
<$action-createtiddler
	$basetitle=<<newnoteTitle>>
	tags=<<newHereButtonTags>>
	caption={{$:/NewNote}}
/>
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentList>> $subfilter="[<newnoteTitle>]"/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/NewNote" text=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/AddNote" text=""/>
</$wikify>
\end

\define cancelNote()
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<newnoteTitle>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/NewNote" text=""/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/AddNote" text=""/>
\end


<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/AddNote" text=<<currentList>>>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="$:/state/AddNote" setTo=<<currentList>>>Add a card...</$button>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/AddNote" text=<<currentList>>>

  <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<<addNote>> tag="div">
  <$edit-text autoHeight="yes" focus="yes" placeholder="Add new note" default="New card" tiddler="$:/NewNote"/>
  </$keyboard>
		
    <$button class="smallgreenbutton" actions=<<addNote>>>Add</$button>
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin: 0 5px;"  actions=<<cancelNote>>>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</$button>

</$reveal>

$:/Tekan/AddList.title: $:/Tekan/AddList

$:/Tekan/BoardSelect.title: $:/Tekan/BoardSelect
$:/Tekan/BoardSelect.text:
\define setboard() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard" text=<>/> \end <$button popup=<>>Board <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Tekanboard]!has[draft.of]]">
<$button style="background: #fff;" actions=<>>
  {{!!caption}}

$:/Tekan/Buttons/newboard.title: $:/Tekan/Buttons/newboard
$:/Tekan/Buttons/newboard.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new board
$:/Tekan/Buttons/newboard.text:

<$button actions={{$:/config/NewKanbanBoard/Actions}} tooltip="Create a new board" aria-label="new board">
Create
</$button>

$:/Tekan/CreateBoardUsingTemplate.title: $:/Tekan/CreateBoardUsingTemplate
$:/Tekan/CreateBoardUsingTemplate.text:
\import $:/Tekan/Macros
|!Kanban Template |<> | |!Board Name |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/NewKanbanBoard/Caption" default="" placeholder="What are you organizing?" tag="input"/> {{$:/Tekan/Buttons/newboard}} |
使用[[基础模板|$:/Tekan/Actions/Basic]]，会创建三个列表：''Planning''、''Ongoing''、''Completed''。
根据需要可以自行修改或者添加模板。

$:/Tikan/EditCardModal.title: $:/Tikan/EditCardModal
$:/Tikan/EditCardModal.text:
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/editcard-caption" class="mod-card-back-title" style="overflow: hidden; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 36px;" tag="input" size="55" />
<$text text={{{ [{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}get[caption]] }}}/> / <$text text={{{ [get[caption]] }}}/> <$list filter="[tag[archive]]">{{archive||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}
<$set name="currentCard" value={{$:/state/editcard}}> <$set name="td-baseName" value={{{ [removeprefix[$:/]] }}}>
<$edit-text class="comment-box-input" placeholder="Write a comment…" style="overflow: hidden; overflow-wrap: break-word; height: 75px;" tiddler=<>/>
<>
<$button tooltip="Delete all information about this card" class="button-link" style="background: #EE6E73;color: #fff;">Delete <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/todolist/data]suffix]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$button class="button-link">Archive <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="archive"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$list filter="[tag[archive]]"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[append]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="+[remove[archive]]"/> <$button tooltip="Open this tiddler in tiddlywiki" class="button-link">View tiddler <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/editcard-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[TwelloMode]!has[draft.of]]"> <$action-setfield tags="$:/tags/PageTemplate"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/Tekan/Main"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/Tekan/Substyles"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/Tekan/Stepping-away-from-TW5-styles" tags=""/> <$button class="button-link" style="color: #fff;background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#5AAC44 0,#519839 100%); background: linear-gradient(to bottom,#5AAC44 0,#519839 100%);">Save & Close <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/editcard-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>

$:/Tekan/Macros.title: $:/Tekan/Macros
$:/Tekan/Macros.text:
\define currentBoard() <$text text={{$:/Tekan/CurrentBoard}}/> \end \define selectKanbanTemplate() <$select tiddler='$:/config/NewKanbanBoard/Actions'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/KanbanTemplate]]'> \end 
<$view field="text"/>

$:/Tekan/Main.title: $:/Tekan/Main
$:/Tekan/Main.text:
\define currentListTag() [[$(currentList)$]] \end \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="-[tag]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags=<>/> <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-listops $subfilter="-[]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define currentBoardTags() [[$(currentBoard)$]] \end \define droplist() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $value=<>/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define cardeditops() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/editcard" text=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/editcard-caption" text={{{ [get[caption]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/Tikan/EditCardModal" currentList=<> currentCard=<>/> \end \define popupstate() $:/state/listops/$(currentList)$ \end \define deletelist() <$list filter="[tag]" variable="currentCard"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$set name="td-baseName" value={{{ [removeprefix[$:/]] }}}> <$list filter="[prefix[$:/todolist/data]suffix]" variable="currentTodolist"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define archivelist() <$list filter="[tag]"> <$action-listops $tags="archive"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> list=""/> \end

<$draggable filter="[tag!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/> <$button tag="span" class="icon-sm icon-overflow-menu-horizontal listitem" popup=<>> <$reveal type="popup" position="below" state=<>>
List Actions
<$button tag="div" class="listopsbutton" actions=<>>Delete List <$button tag="div" class="listopsbutton" actions=<>>Archive List

    <$droppable actions=<>>
     
    <$draggable tiddler=<> tag="li"><$view field="caption"/> <$button tag="span" class="icon-sm icon-edit list-card-operation listitem" actions=<>>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$droppable actions=<> tag="div">
 
{{||$:/Tekan/AddCard}}

Lists of <$text text={{{ [get[caption]] }}}/>

    <$droppable actions=<>>
     
    <$draggable tiddler=<> tag="li"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/>
<$button class="smallgreenbutton" set="$:/state/rearrlist" setTo="">Done

Delete Board<$button tag="span" class="xp-tekan-button" style="right:0;position: absolute;padding: 0 3%;cursor:pointer">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/deleteboardpopup"/>

$:/Using Tekan.title: $:/Using Tekan
$:/Using Tekan.text:
这是 Tekan，一个基于 ~TiddlyWiki 的看板（Kanban）。认识 Tekan 最简单的方法就是使用它。那么让我们开始吧。

* 点击页面按钮 {{$:/Tekan/Switch}} 进入看板。
* 点击右上角 <<.icon $:/core/images/new-button>> 按钮，创建一个新的面板。
* 点击「Add a list」新建一个列表。
* 点击列表中的「Add a card」可以创建任务卡片。
* 编辑卡片，在内容框中可以添加任务说明；其下方可以添加该任务卡片的 Todolist。点击 <$button>Save & Close</$button> 保存并关闭卡片。
* 通过拖拽，将卡片在不同列表之间转移。
* 左上角的 <button>Board</button> 按钮，可切换其他面板。
* 右上角那排按钮分别可以重新排列列表、删除当前面板、新建面板、返回 ~TiddlyWiki。{{$:/Tekan/NavboardButtons}}（鼠标悬浮其上会有提示）

$:/Tekan/macros/todolist-ui.title: $:/Tekan/macros/todolist-ui
$:/Tekan/macros/todolist-ui.text:
\define td-basePath() $:/todolist/data \define kanban-todolist-ui(caption:"A plain todolist", width:"100%") \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Todolist/Macro]!has[draft.of]] \whitespace trim <$vars nameSpace= """$(td-baseName)$""" stateTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/state/$(td-baseName)$""" taskTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/tasks/$(td-baseName)$""" doneTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/done/$(td-baseName)$""" statusTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/status/$(td-baseName)$""" priorityTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/priority/$(td-baseName)$""" archiveTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/archive/$(td-baseName)$""" displayArchivedTiddler="""Todolist - Archived Items - $(td-baseName)$""" >

$caption$

<>
<>
<>
<>
<> <$list filter="[getindex[editview]match[edit]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$macrocall $name="draggable-list" targetTiddler=<> />"""> <> <$list filter="[indexes[]!nsort[]]" variable="item"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done-task" field="text" />
\end

$:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme.title: $:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme
$:/plugins/tesseract/tekan/readme.text:
Tekan is a simple kanban client using ~TiddlyWiki. 对原插件做了修改，现在可以随便命名面板和卡片，不会与维基内容相冲突。 ''Dependents:'' $:/plugins/kookma/todolist
''Tutorials:'' [[Using Tekan|$:/Using Tekan]] !! 创建面板 {{$:/Tekan/CreateBoardUsingTemplate}} !! Issues 问题 使用 Tekan 会导致 [[hotzone|$:/plugins/felixhayashi/hotzone]] 失效。所以 Open 标签页和 ~TiddlyMap 中的高亮也将失效。 刷新维基后才会恢复。
